name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes Demo
formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes Demo
description:
Connect! Co-operate! Conquer!

Buddy up with two other heroes locally or online (when available) to triumph over enemies and puzzles as a dynamic trio in this exclusive multiplayer demo for The Legend of Zelda™: Tri Force Heroes!

You need to team up with two other friends in local co-op multiplayer to enjoy this demo.
Each player needs a copy of the demo, then you can play together using Local Play.

At the moment, there are no online multiplayer sessions available. We apologise for the inconvenience.
